channel.title: RawFood on Lam Family Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in RawFood on Lam Family Cookbook

item.title: Garlic and Herb Dip
item.description: Original image filename: Garlic_and_herb_dip.jpg Ingredients Small bunch fresh Parsley 1 small clove garlic 2 shallots/spring onions 250g cream cheese 2 tbls yoghurt, or 10â€“20 g Milk (optional) Method Place parsley, garlic and shallots/spring onions into TM bowl.

item.title: Natural Home Scents
item.description: Notes Add fragrance to your home using simmering waters infused with spices, herbs & fruit. Scent #1 Oranges, cinnamon & cloves (allspice and anise are optional). This scent carries into multiple rooms better, and it can be reheated to scent your rooms for several days.

item.title: Tumeric Tea
item.description: Original image filename: Tumeric_tea.jpg Ingredients 1/3 cup or 80ml good raw honey 1 1/2 tsp dried tumeric Lemon lots of freshly ground black pepper Method Work the turmeric into the honey until it forms a paste.

item.title: Chewy Chocolate Cookies
item.description: Ingredients 150 grams macadamias 150 grams medjool dates, seeds removed 1 tablespoon cacao or cocoa or carob Method Preheat oven to 180 Degrees Celcius. Line an oven tray with baking paper.

item.title: Creamy Hemp Pesto
item.description: Original image filename: HempPestoPasta.jpg Original image caption: From website. Ingredients - Cashew Cream 1 cup cashews 3/4 cup water Ingredients - Pesto 2 cups fresh basil, packed 1/3 cup hemp seeds 2 garlic cloves 2/3 cup extra virgin olive oil zest of 1 lemon pinch of salt and pepper 1/2 cup cashew cream Method - Cashew Cream Blend cashews and water in a Thermomix until ultra smooth.

item.title: Fruity Nut Balls
item.description: Original image filename: Fruity_nut_balls.jpg Ingredients 1 cup of natural muesli 1/2 cup of macadamia 1 drop Young Living Orange essential oil Pinch of salt 1 tsp honey Method Grind muesli with macadamia nuts in food processor until fine.

item.title: Natural Muesli
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup shredded coconut 1/2 cup dried figs 1/2 cup dried apricots 1/2 cup raisins or sultanas 1/4 cup dried cranberries 1/2 cup dried dates 1/2 cup sunflower seeds 1/2 cup activated almonds 1/2 cup activated walnuts 1/2 cup activated cashews Method Blend all ingredients in food processor to desired texture.

item.title: Raw Cacao Bliss Balls
item.description: Ingredients 110g Almonds raw, nuts 110g pitted dates 20g pepitas (pumpkin seeds) 35g shredded Coconut 20g goji berries 20g raw organic cacao powder 1tbl chia seeds Method Place almonds into TM bowl, Blend 20sec,sp9.

item.title: Tropical Mango Matcha Smoothie Cake
item.description: Original image caption: Tropical Mango Matcha Smoothie Description Do you have a picky eater in your household who refuses to eat their veggies? The trick is all in the presentation!
